channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- undertow as shipped in Jboss EAP 7.1.0.GA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- undertow as shipped in Jboss EAP 7.1.0.GA

item.title: CVE-2018-1048|2024-08-05T03:44:11.828Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- undertow%20as%20shipped%20in%20jboss%20eap%207.1.0.ga
item.description: It was found that the AJP connector in undertow, as shipped in Jboss EAP 7.1.0.GA, does not use the ALLOW_ENCODED_SLASH option and thus allow the the slash / anti-slash characters encoded in the url which may lead to path traversal and result in the information disclosure of arbitrary local files.
